title: Notice of tax due and demand for payment
description: You owe money on unpaid taxes. This notice shows the amount of tax, interest, and penalties you owe.

title: Your refund is being reviewed
description: The IRS is reviewing your tax return and holding your refund until the review is complete.

title: Refund information
description: Your refund is being processed. This is a normal part of the refund process and doesn't indicate a problem.

title: Additional liability pending
description: An additional liability is pending on your account. This may indicate an audit or adjustment.

title: Balance due on amended return
description: You owe money based on changes made to your tax return. This notice shows the amount you owe.

title: Refund issued
description: Your refund has been approved and is being issued. This indicates your refund is on its way.

title: Changes to your return
description: The IRS made changes to your tax return and you're getting a different refund amount.

title: Notice issued
description: A notice has been issued regarding your tax return. Check your mail for details.

title: Changes to your return due to Earned Income Credit
description: The IRS made changes to your Earned Income Credit and you're getting a different refund amount.

title: Return filed and tax liability assessed
description: Your tax return has been processed and your tax liability has been assessed.

title: Credit to your account
description: A credit has been applied to your account, which may increase your refund.

title: Earned Income Credit
description: Earned Income Credit has been applied to your account, which may increase your refund.

title: Additional tax assessed
description: Additional tax has been assessed on your account, which may reduce your refund.

title: Examination request indicator
description: Your return has been selected for examination (audit). You will receive a notice with details.

title: Refund freeze
description: Your refund has been frozen. This may be due to outstanding debts or additional review requirements.
